title: Loading Issues
body:
"There is a problem with your connection. If you are not currently connected to the internet, please do so. If you are already on-line but cannot connect to League of Legends, check our support to find possible solutions."

THESE LIVE INCIDENTS MAY HAVE CAUSED THE ERROR:
* Account transfers are currently unavailable in the updated client. please launch the legacy client if you would like to transfer your account.

Anyone dealt with this before? I'm using the new BETA version, i wonder if that has to do with this. Going to check out the support page also, but wondered if anyone has dealt with this before.

Thanks.

replies.body: During the time you posted this, there was an external network issue affecting a number of our services. This has been resolved since then, so please let me know if you're still experiencing this issue.
Around this same time i couldn't connect to a game and got a ban. Like does this have something to do with that?
I wasn't able to find any records for gameserver availability being impacted by this incident, so I don't believe so.

Hey, I have the same problem. My internet disconnected for 5 seconds, then after restarting the client that pop up remained and even after reopening the client around 5 times it still hasnt gone away. {{summoner:3}}
